name: ASTROIDS (Naveed Khalid)
description:
Hey,

           I worked really hard on this game hope you guys enjoy it.

This is a classic astroids game now available to play in your browser, Enjoy!

It would be really awesome if you could donate, it helps in building awesome projects like this.

I would be releasing the following versions soon :

  • Windows
  • Mac
  • Linux
  • Android

Stay Tuned.
